en.title: Wildcard Brand Lab
en.label: Identity · 2023
en.summary: Typography-led identity and launch kit for a remote design studio expanding into APAC.
en.description:
Wildcard Brand Lab needed a voice that translated across digital and physical touchpoints for its APAC launch. I built a typographic system that balances grit and technology, plus a shared Figma library covering social, presentation, and proposal materials.

Offline deliverables included a foldable business card that follows the brand's cutting lines and a UV-layered pitch deck cover to underscore the studio's experimental spirit.
highlights: 72-page brand guideline spanning digital and print applications
Figma component library supporting three language layouts
Introduced a Notion brand asset database for the distributed team

zh.title: Wildcard Brand Lab
zh.label: 識別系統 · 2023
zh.summary: 為遠距設計團隊打造排版導向的品牌識別與上市工具。
zh.role: 品牌策略 · 識別系統 · 印刷
zh.description:
Wildcard Brand Lab 要進軍 APAC，需要兼具數位與實體的品牌語言。我從字體聲線出發，打造粗獷又具有科技感的排版系統，並為社群素材、簡報與提案 deck 建立共用的 Figma 品牌庫。

同時我也設計了兩套印刷物：可沿線裁切的折紙型名片，以及 UV 層次的 Pitch Deck 封面，強化品牌的實驗性。
highlights: 72 頁品牌指引，涵蓋數位與印刷應用
Figma component library，支援 3 種語系版型
協助設計團隊導入 Notion 品牌資產資料庫
